titles.title: To authorize a junior reserve officers training pilot program by the Coast Guard.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 3/17/1993--Introduced. Authorizes a pilot program to establish and maintain a junior reserve officers training program, in cooperation with Miami Beach Senior High School, Miami Beach, Florida, to provide students at the School with: (1) instruction in subject areas relating to Coast Guard operations; and (2) training in skills which are useful and appropriate for a career in the Coast Guard.
